#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		long long int n;
		cin>>n;
		if(n==0)
			printf("0\n");
		else if(n>=1&&n<=6)
			printf("2\n");
		else if(n>=7&&n<=75)
			printf("3\n");
		else if(n>=76&&n<=480)
			printf("4\n");
		else if(n>=481&&n<=2205)
			printf("5\n");
		else if(n>=2206&&n<=8232)
			printf("6\n");
		else if(n>=8233&&n<=26544)
			printf("7\n");
		else if(n>=26545&&n<=75000)
			printf("8\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
